title: What does social studies include? - Quora

response.answer_text: Social Studies is the integrated study of social sciences, humanities,and history. aim of social Studies s to imbibe in a student coordinated systematic study and develop the ability to make informed and reasoned decisions for public good of culturally diverse democratic society.it involves necessary parts of subjects like-Anthropology,ArchaeologyEeconomics, Geography, History, jurispredence, Philopsophy,Politics,psychology, religion and social sciences and natural sciences. In school curriculum it is divided into, mainly, -History and geography, kn higher classes,after sixth grade.

I High School in South Carolina my Social Studied certificate allows me to teach US History, World History, Economics, Government/Civics, World Geography, Psychology, Sociology and Anthropology. Am I competent in all of those disciplines? No. Anthropology???? I had to get an extra certification for AP US History.
